Agreement_A.description: The description states the borrower has the right to cancel the transaction within 3 business days. While the policy requires a Right of Rescission notice, this right typically does not apply to purchase money mortgages, making the description potentially misleading for this transaction type.

Agreement_B.description: The Monthly Payment (Principal & Interest) of $14,557.23 is incorrect for a $1,750,000 loan at 5.75% interest over the stated 25-year (300 months) amortization period. The calculated payment should be approximately $10,837.19.

The stated Monthly Payment ($14,557.23) corresponds to a 15-year amortization period, which contradicts the specified 25-year amortization period and the disclosure of a balloon payment due at the end of the 15-year loan term.
